languages.text: "Мальпийцы ведут себя дерзко, явившись в чужую обитель. Стоит назначить им епитимью и отправить в паломничество для поиска реликвий святого Когнация и познания пути святого Кифы. Так они принесут пользу, возвращая утерянные святыни, а Орден Молота будет удовлетворен правосудием".

"By coming to a foreign realm, the Malpians are demonstrating their insolence. Penance should be imposed on them. We will send them on a pilgrimage to find the relics of Saint Cognatius and to learn the ways of Saint Keefe. In this way, they would be of use for returning the lost relics, and the Order of the Hammer would be satisfied with a just verdict."
languages.original_text: "Мальпийцы ведут себя дерзко, явившись в чужую обитель. Стоит назначить им епитимью и отправить в паломничество для поиска реликвий святого Когнация и познания пути святого Кифы. Так они принесут пользу, возвращая утерянные святыни, а Орден Молота будет удовлетворен правосудием".

traits.locale_text: "By coming to a foreign realm, the Malfesians are demonstrating their insolence. The penance should be imposed on them by sending them on a pilgrimage to find the relics of Saint Cognatius and to learn the ways of Saint Cephas. In this way, they would be of use for returning the lost relics, and the Order of the Hammer would be satisfied with a just verdict."

languages.text: “那些马尔皮人身处陌生国度，行事却如此傲慢，他们应受到惩罚。我们可以派他们去朝圣，寻找圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物，学习圣赛法斯的生活理念。这样的公正判决既可以让马尔皮人发挥作用，寻回丢失的遗物，也能令重锤修会感到满意。”
languages.original_text: "By coming to a foreign realm, the Malpians are demonstrating their insolence. Penance should be imposed on them. We will send them on a pilgrimage to find the relics of Saint Cognatius and to learn the ways of Saint Cephas. In this way, they would be of use for returning the lost relics, and the Order of the Hammer would be satisfied with a just verdict."

traits.locale_text: “那些马尔皮人身处陌生国度，行事却如此傲慢，他们应受到惩罚。我们可以派他们去朝圣，寻找圣科尼亚蒂乌斯的遗物，学习圣赛法斯的生活理念。这样的公正判决既可以让马尔皮人发挥作用，寻回丢失的遗物，也能令重锤修会感到满意。”

languages.text: «Al venir a un reino extranjero, los malpianos están demostrando su insolencia. Hay que imponerles penitencia. Los enviaremos en peregrinación para que encuentren las reliquias de san Cognatius y aprendan los caminos de san Cefas. De este modo, serían útiles para devolver las reliquias perdidas, y la Orden del Martillo quedaría satisfecha con un veredicto justo».
languages.original_text: "By coming to a foreign realm, the Malpians are demonstrating their insolence. Penance should be imposed on them. We will send them on a pilgrimage to find the relics of Saint Cognatius and to learn the ways of Saint Cephas. In this way, they would be of use for returning the lost relics, and the Order of the Hammer would be satisfied with a just verdict."

traits.locale_text: «Al venir a un reino extranjero, los malpianos están demostrando su insolencia. Hay que imponerles penitencia. Los enviaremos en peregrinación para que encuentren las reliquias de san Cognatius y aprendan los caminos de san Cefas. De este modo, serían útiles para devolver las reliquias perdidas, y la Orden del Martillo quedaría satisfecha con un veredicto justo».

languages.text: 「異国の領域へ来たことで、マルピ人は横柄さを示している。彼らに懺悔を課すべきだ。彼らを巡礼の旅に遣わし、聖コグナティウスの聖遺物を探し出して聖セファスの道を学ばせるのだ。そうすれば、失われた聖遺物の返還に役立てることができ、鉄槌の修道会も正当な判決に満足するだろう」
languages.original_text: "By coming to a foreign realm, the Malpians are demonstrating their insolence. Penance should be imposed on them. We will send them on a pilgrimage to find the relics of Saint Cognatius and to learn the ways of Saint Cephas. In this way, they would be of use for returning the lost relics, and the Order of the Hammer would be satisfied with a just verdict."

traits.locale_text: 「異国の領域へ来たことで、マルピ人は横柄さを示している。彼らに懺悔を課すべきだ。彼らを巡礼の旅に遣わし、聖コグナティウスの聖遺物を探し出して聖セファスの道を学ばせるのだ。そうすれば、失われた聖遺物の返還に役立てることができ、鉄槌の修道会も正当な判決に満足するだろう」

languages.text: « En faisant ainsi irruption en territoire étranger, les Malpiens ont une fois de plus démontré leur insolence. Ils doivent être châtiés. Nous les enverrons en pèlerinage pour trouver les reliques de Saint Cognatius et embrasser la vision de Saint Céphas. Ainsi, ils seront utiles à notre quête d'objets sacrés perdus, et l'Ordre du Marteau saluera cette juste sentence. »
languages.original_text: "By coming to a foreign realm, the Malpians are demonstrating their insolence. Penance should be imposed on them. We will send them on a pilgrimage to find the relics of Saint Cognatius and to learn the ways of Saint Cephas. In this way, they would be of use for returning the lost relics, and the Order of the Hammer would be satisfied with a just verdict."

traits.locale_text: « En faisant ainsi irruption en territoire étranger, les Malpiens ont une fois de plus démontré leur insolence. Ils doivent être châtiés. Nous les enverrons en pèlerinage pour trouver les reliques de Saint Cognatius et embrasser la vision de Saint Céphas. Ainsi, ils seront utiles à notre quête d'objets sacrés perdus, et l'Ordre du Marteau saluera cette juste sentence. »

languages.text: "Indem sie in ein fremdes Reich gekommen sind, beweisen die Malpianer ihre Unverfrorenheit. Sie sollten bestraft werden. Wir schicken sie auf eine Pilgerreise, um die Reliquien des Heiligen Cognatius zu finden und die Wege des Heiligen Cephas zu lernen. Auf diese Weise wären sie für die Wiederbeschaffung der verlorenen Reliquien nützlich und der Orden des Hammers wäre mit einem gerechten Urteil zufrieden."
languages.original_text: "By coming to a foreign realm, the Malpians are demonstrating their insolence. Penance should be imposed on them. We will send them on a pilgrimage to find the relics of Saint Cognatius and to learn the ways of Saint Cephas. In this way, they would be of use for returning the lost relics, and the Order of the Hammer would be satisfied with a just verdict."
